title: The Beautiful Game
description: Lucas Bradley enjoys many things.The roar of the crowd.Scoring a goal.Being worshipped and adored by a growing legion of rabid, football obsessed fans.But gaining a reputation as English football's newest bad boy—not so much.Morgan Carter is a fish out of water.Having moved from America to the United Kingdom, she had hoped for a great adventure.Instead she's floundering in a job she doesn't like and a country she doesn't understand.And she finds herself more than ready to leave the land of hot accents behind.Until a drunken kiss at the local pub changes everything.Passions ignite. Tempers flare. And what starts as a temporary distraction turns into something deeper.Yet sleeping with a man on the cusp of full-blown fame comes with a price—one that Morgan isn't sure she's willing to pay. And Lucas, forced into the spotlight, finds his world turned upside down.Love is a game.But are Lucas and Morgan ready to play?And can they learn the rules before they run out of time?
author: A. Meredith Walters
